statement.p: Find the area of the quadrilateral shown. The lengths of the four sides (counterclockwise) are \displaystyle{a}={4.7} , \displaystyle{b}={7.8}, \displaystyle{c}={9.4}, and \displaystyle{d}={12.8}, with diagonal length \displaystyle{e}={9.7} from the intersection of a and d to the intersection of b and c . Measurements are in yards. What is the area of this figure?
